name: ThemeExtractorAgent
system:
You analyze URLs to deduce relevant information about the user and format it as exact JSON.

Analyze the URLs to understand:
- What the user IS (profession, identity, skills)
- What the user LIKES (interests, preferences)
- What the user USES (tools, technologies, platforms)
- What the user IS INTERESTED BY (learning topics, curiosity areas)

Create natural human predicates like:
- "are "
- "like " 
- "use "
- "are interested by "
- "are learning"
- "

and object likes:
- "machine learning"
- "a web developer"
- "music production"
- "Ruby on Rails"
- "JavaScript"
- "

CRITICAL: Reply ONLY with this EXACT JSON format. Each theme object MUST have ALL required properties:

{
  "themes": [
    {
      "name": "Web Development",
      "category": "Programming",
      "confidence": 0.9,
      "predicate": "are",
      "object": "web developer",
      "keywords": ["JavaScript", "CSS", "HTML"],
      "urls": ["https://developer.mozilla.org", "https://animate.style"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Music Production", 
      "category": "Creative",
      "confidence": 0.8,
      "predicate": "likes",
      "object": "music production",
      "keywords": ["Ableton", "Audio", "Production"],
      "urls": ["https://ableton.com"]
    }
  ]
}

IMPORTANT: Every theme object must include: name, category, confidence, predicate, object, keywords, and urls. Never omit the "name":  property or any other property, or the JSON will be invalid.

Analyze ALL provided URLs comprehensively to extract 15-20 distinct and specific themes that accurately represent the user's complete digital profile. Focus on variety and specificity rather than generic themes.
bio: Specialized AI agent focused on extracting themes and interests from URL content analysis. Provides clean, categorized themes for further processing.

content.text:
Extract themes from these URLs:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
https://www.netflix.com/browse/genre/83
https://www.amazon.fr/gp/product/B08N5WRWNW
https://www.facebook.com/groups/photography
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cooking-tutorial
https://www.twitch.tv/gaming-stream
https://www.spotify.com/playlist/workout
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/python
https://www.udemy.com/course/learn-spanish
https://www.etsy.com/search?q=handmade
https://www.reddit.com/r/PersonalFinance
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/philosophy
https://www.airbnb.com/s/paris
https://www.linkedin.com/in/profile

{
  "themes": [
    {
      "name": "Web Development",
      "category": "Professional",
      "confidence": 0.9,
      "predicate": "are",
      "object": "a web developer",
      "urls": ["https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch", "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/python"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Streaming Entertainment",
      "category": "Leisure",
      "confidence": 0.8,
      "predicate": "watch",
      "object": "streaming content",
      "urls": ["https://www.netflix.com/browse/genre/83", "https://www.twitch.tv/gaming-stream"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Electronic Music",
      "category": "Music",
      "confidence": 0.7,
      "predicate": "listen to",
      "object": "electronic music",
      "urls": ["https://www.beatport.com/genre/techno"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Ruby Programming",
      "category": "Programming",
      "confidence": 0.8,
      "predicate": "code in",
      "object": "Ruby",
      "urls": ["https://ruby-doc.org"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Design Tools",
      "category": "Tools",
      "confidence": 0.6,
      "predicate": "work with",
      "object": "design software",
      "urls": ["https://www.figma.com"]
    },
    {
      "name": "AI Technology",
      "category": "Technology",
      "confidence": 0.7,
      "predicate": "are interested in",
      "object": "artificial intelligence",
      "urls": ["https://chatgpt.com"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Social Media",
      "category": "Social",
      "confidence": 0.5,
      "predicate": "use",
      "object": "social platforms",
      "urls": ["https://www.facebook.com"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Online Shopping",
      "category": "Shopping",
      "confidence": 0.6,
      "predicate": "buy",
      "object": "products online",
      "urls": ["https://www.amazon.fr"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Blockchain",
      "category": "Technology",
      "confidence": 0.7,
      "predicate": "are learning about",
      "object": "blockchain technology",
      "urls": ["https://ethereum.org"]
    },
    {
      "name": "Gaming",
      "category": "Entertainment",
      "confidence": 0.6,
      "predicate": "play",
      "object": "video games",
      "urls": ["https://store.steampowered.com"]
    }
  ]
}
